snippet: The N.F.L. appointed Ted Wells, one of the country’s top defense lawyers, to investigate the allegations of workplace misconduct swirling around the Miami Dolphins.
abstract: NFL appoints Ted Wells, one of the country’s top defense lawyers, to investigate allegations of workplace misconduct swirling around the Miami Dolphins, sign that league wants to reassure the public it is taking the matter seriously; case involves allegations that Richie Incognito bullied teammate Jonathan Martin and used racial epithets.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. appointed Ted Wells, one of the country’s top defense lawyers, to investigate the allegations of workplace misconduct swirling around the Miami Dolphins.

headline.main: N.F.L. Picks Lawyer to Lead Inquiry Into Dolphins
headline.print_headline: Top Lawyer to Lead Inquiry Into Dolphins
